Activities Added

Evaluate Activities

×

Now evaluate each activity. Score each based on your opinion(s) of how much effort it will take to implement and how much positive impact the activity will have on addressing the issue. 1 means very low or not much and 5 means very high or a lot.

Effort Scale: 1 = Very Low Effort → 5 = Very High Effort
Impact Scale: 1 = Very Low Impact → 5 = Very High Impact
